title: Code editor
description: This project is an online code editor designed to learn and experiment with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in a practical environment. It allows users to create web pages directly from their browser, with no installation required. The editor offers advanced features such as automatic saving, jQuery support, auto-closing of tags and brackets, and a live preview of changes. This project makes frontend learning easier and speeds up the web prototyping process.

title: Uno
description: I created an Uno game using JavaScript. The game simulates the classic Uno card gameplay, allowing users to play against AI or other players in a web environment. It features interactive gameplay, real-time card handling, and a dynamic interface, providing an engaging experience while demonstrating practical skills in frontend development and JavaScript programming.

title: up-cadeaux
description: I developed Up-Cadeaux, an e-commerce platform for my previous company using Magento and PHP Symfony, designed to sell digital gift cards. The platform enables users to browse, purchase, and send gift cards instantly, offering a seamless and secure online shopping experience. Features include digital card management, automated delivery, and a user-friendly interface, highlighting my skills in backend and frontend development, as well as e-commerce solutions.
